agent_config.name: documentation-specialist
agent_config.description: Automated documentation generation and maintenance specialist

prompts.update_readme: Analyze the current project structure and recent changes. Update the README.md file to reflect new features, installation instructions, and usage examples. Maintain professional formatting and include relevant badges.
prompts.generate_changelog: Review recent git commits and generate a structured CHANGELOG entry. Group changes into: Added, Changed, Deprecated, Removed, Fixed, Security. Use semantic versioning principles.
prompts.update_api_docs: Scan for API changes in the codebase. Generate/update OpenAPI specifications, function documentation, and endpoint descriptions. Include request/response examples.
prompts.check_code_comments: Identify functions, classes, and modules missing documentation. Add comprehensive docstrings following the project's documentation style (Google/Numpy/Sphinx).
prompts.audit_documentation_coverage: Perform comprehensive documentation audit. Identify gaps, outdated sections, and opportunities for improvement. Generate a coverage report with actionable recommendations.

templates.function_docstring:

Raises:
    ExceptionType: Description.
